```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)

# Load Functions.
source("../../functions/myFunctions.R") 

# Load packages.
installMissingPackages(
  c(
    # Include statistical packages.
    "performance",
    "lmerTest",
    "lme4",
    "optimx",
    
    "MuMIn",
    # Include packages for tidy output.
    "tidyverse",
    "broomExtra",
    "sjPlot",
    "formattable",
    "knitr",
    "RColorBrewer",
    # Include packages for %in% %notin% syntactic notation
    "mefa4"
  )
)
```


```{r load corpus}
# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(speaker,
         gender,
         mode,
         prompt,
         acc_phon,
         fin_phon,
         l_f0) %>%
  # keep only explicitly LH pitch accents.
  filter(acc_phon %notin% c("H*", ">H*")) %>%
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]"))
         )

```

- Beginning with intercepts only model as per h_f0
```{r set equation and optimizer}
my_equation = formula(
  l_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + (1 + mode + acc_phon | speaker)
  + (1 | gender)
  + (1 | fin_phon)
  + (1 | prompt)
)

# prompt causes singularity. Removing from model.
my_equation = formula(
  l_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + (1 | speaker)
# + (1 | gender)
  + (1 | fin_phon)
# + (1 | prompt)
)
optimizer = "optimx"
```

```{r run initial models,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, include=FALSE}
l_f0_model <-
  lmer(my_equation,
       m_corpus,
    control = lmerControl(
      optimizer = optimizer,
      calc.derivs = FALSE,
      optCtrl = list(
        method = "nlminb",
        starttests = FALSE,
        kkt = FALSE
      )
    )
  )
summariseLME(l_f0_model, run_step = TRUE)
```


```{r trim model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}
m_corpus.trimmed <- m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(l_f0_model))) <= 2.8)

l_f0_model.trimmed <-
  lmer(my_equation,
    data = m_corpus.trimmed,
    control = lmerControl(
      optimizer = "bobyqa",
      calc.derivs = FALSE,
      optCtrl = list(
        method = "nlminb",
        starttests = FALSE,
        kkt = FALSE
      )
    )
  )

summariseLME(l_f0_model.trimmed, run_step = TRUE,
              write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_l_f0_anova.csv")

```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=5, fig.width=7, results="asis"}
l_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(l_f0_model.trimmed,
                                write="../output/Mode_PA_l_f0"
                                )
l_f0_model.tidy$table
```

```{r do pairwise analysis}
# Get number of levels in target treatment variable.

charts <- getModelFixedFX(
  my_equation = my_equation,
  my_data = m_corpus.trimmed,
  write="../output/Mode_PA_l_f0",
  optimizer = "bobyqa"
)
charts$intercepts
charts$slopes



```
